metadata.title: API MultipartFormDataParser temporary uploaded file created with insecure permissions (low)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Jenkins weekly and LTS due to an issue when processing file uploads using the MultipartFormDataParser. By sending a specially crafted request, a local authenticated attacker could bypass security restrictions and access the Jenkins controller file system to read and write the files before they are used.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
